name: Optimum Time Big Sailing Watch OS3 Series
description:
The famous Big Sailing Watch is a favourite with sailors everywhere, as used at the 2012 Olympics

Never again will you have an excuse for missing the race start. This jumbo watch can be worn on the wrist or secured around the mast for all crew members to see. The bright coloured 65mm casing makes it easily visible and the large 16mm digits make this a must for every race boat owner.

Optimum Time make the Ronstan Clearstart watches - this watch is identical, just sold under their own name.

Pink arriving end of October 2013 - order now for delivery in November.

OS3 Series Features

SIZE
- Large 65mm overall ABS case
- 38mm x 20mm display size
- Massive 16mm digit height

FEATURES
- Single row display
- Adjustable Viewing Angle
- Boom/Mast Mount Bracket Supplied
- Elasticated Strap for Wrist or over sleeve wearing
- Water Resistant to 5 ATM
- Shock Resistant Construction
- Normal Timekeeping Mode (12 or 24 Hour)

SPECIALIST SAILING TIMER FUNCTIONS:
- 5,4,1,0 ISAF start sequence pre-programmed with audible warning signals (can be silenced if preferred)
- Countdown repeat option or
- Countdown and Up to show elapsed time for handicap races
- 5 minute, 3 minute and multiples of 1 minute programs as well
- Sync Button for instant synchronisation if a gun is missed

White - OS310
Yellow - OS315
Blue - OS314
Pink - OS319

name: Quantum Optimist XR-1 Sail
description:
Quantum's new Crosscut Hybrid Opti Sail

The XR-1 Opti Sail features the latest sail materials and technology including a new sail cloth with superior stretch resistance and a new design with more volume at the top for faster sailing.

• New sail cloth with superior stretch resistance, strength, and durability
• More volume at the top for faster sailing, especially downwind
• Lighter reinforcements for less overall weight, and better performance
• Crosscut panels combine with a radial top resulting in more camber without closing the leech
• Lighter foot and head tapes reduce weight and are more flexible

Two models based on skipper’s weight:
Green - up to 45 kg
Black - 46+ kg

All sails come complete with battens, vision window, luff & leech tell-tales, IODA royalty button, tube bag, sail ties and sail numbers (digital eights for customer installation).

Free delivery in Adelaide Metro area, call us on 0466 454 806 for freight costs to other areas.

name: Ex-Charter Optimist
description:
As New, Ex Charter Boats.

Built by Zou Inter Marine
IODA'95 Top Quality Hull fully serviced. 
OPTIPARTS Black Gold Spars.
Foam Epoxy Foils  
Aluminium Beach Trolley.
Top Cover
Foils Carry Bag
Mainsheet system with extension.
Bailer, Praddle, Towline.
Price does not include a sail.

Delivery charges may apply if you live outside the Adelaide metro area. Please contact us for more information.

name: The Winner's Guide to Optimist Sailing
description:
Written by champion sailors and sailing coaches Gary Jobson and Jay Kehoe.

Everything you need to know about:
-equipment, lines, and useful knots
-basic sailing tips, including where to sit, how to launch and land, tacking, jibing, and Rules of the Road
-weather awareness
-more advanced sailing skills - going faster!
-racing, including starts, upwind tactics, finishes, and dealing with protests
-practicing alone or in groups

This book is the most comprehensive guide for kids learning to sail and race in Optis ever written. 
Its step-by-step format is perfect for young sailors, and it has special sections of advice for parents and coaches.

Paperback, published 2004, 176 pages.
Free postage anywhere in Australia.

name: RYA Go Sailing Activity Book
description:
Author Royal Yachting Association.
Beautifully illustrated and packed with games, quizzes, exercises & 2 pages of stickers. The Go Sailing Activity Book is a fun and educational book for all budding sailors.
Paperback, published 2006, 37 pages.
Free postage anywhere in Australia.

name: Hawk Wind Vane
description:
Replacement Wind Vane Arm

The Little Hawk Vane Arm is made of super tough nylon and is all but indestructible, but sometimes they get lost! 
The Sailing Shop is the only retailer in Australia selling the replacement vanes. 
Fits both the Mark 1 & Mark 2 Hawk Wind Indicators. 
Orange Nylon, Made in England.

name: Magic Marine Optimist Airbag
description:
Airbag for Optimist Dinghy
Inflated size: 29cm x 92cm. 
Deflated size: 44cm x 98cm, radius 5cm. 
Volume: 48 litres

Colours available -blue, grey, purple or orange
Note: the purple is at the maroon end of the purple spectrum, any QLD sailors interested?

15008.130576

name: Byte CII Dinghy
description:
ON SALE $1,000 OFF.

Ex 2010 Youth Olympics Charter Boats.
Built by Extreme Sailing Products.
Ready to sail - Refurbished hulls and foils. New fittings. Trolley and covers. 
Free delivery in South Australia, please inquire about freight to other Australian States.

The Byte CII is the perfect next step for the young sailor who has grown out of their Optimist, but isn't heavy enough for a Laser.
Designed by Ian Bruce, designer of the Laser, with a rig designed by Julian Bethwaite, this is an exciting dinghy for sailors weighing 40-73kg. Ideal racing weight is 54 - 66kg.

3.7 metres LOA and only 45kg. YV Yardstick 114.8

The Byte CII has been selected as the single handed dinghy for the 2014 Youth Olympics. 

If you live in Adelaide and would like a test sail, get in touch with Andrew or Emma.

For more information check out our Byte blog - bytecii.blogspot.com.au

name: PROtect Optimist Kit
description:
This kit has been developed by PROtect tapes and optimized by top Opti coach, Ferdando “Happy” Alegre and contains a large selection of UHMWPE tapes with acrylic adhesive, skived PTFE tapes with high temperature silicon adhesive and PTFE disks. Both polymers have highest resistance to abrasion and extremely low friction.

The kit contains the following 29 items to improve the boat performance and minimize the risk of equipment damage and avoid possible failure:

• 5 PTFE coins (1, 1.5 and 2mm) for the mast step to move up the mast to the limit (1.0-­‐7.5mm) Tapes are die cut, with liner and easy to apply on:

• the mast, to reduce to the minimum the friction between the mast and mast step

• the daggerboard slot, top and bottom, to minimize the gap down to 14mm

• the boom, to reduce the friction outhaul

• the sprit and mast, to reduce the friction to the minimum

• the mast, to reduce the friction with the sprit block

• the top of the daggerboard slot to avoid damage to the case

• the bow, stern corners and stern side of the rudder to protect them from impact

Additionally, 6 rubber daggerboard stops and one roll of rigging tape for all purposes.

PMK066

name: Quantum Optimist Sail
description:
LAST RADIAL LEFT IN AUSTRALIA 
1 Xtra Heavy (49kg+)

Quantum’s Radial Optimist Sails are made of the highest quality 2.99 Polykote Dacron from Contender, which has proven to be the most durable cloth in the Opti class. The sail panels are cut with threads facing the stress direction for greatest strength and shape-holding ability.

All sails come complete with battens, vision window, luff & leech tell-tales, IODA royalty button, tube bag, sail ties.

Includes sail numbers (digital eights for customer installation) and has been measured by the National Optimist sail measurer, measurement form included.

Free delivery in Adelaide Metro area, call us on 0466 454 806 for freight costs to other areas.

name: Optimum Time Big Sailing Watch OS14 Series
description:
Order now for delivery in January.

Forget the rest - buy the best featured new sailing watch on the market!!!

This new watch is just 4mm bigger in diameter than the Series 3. That small increase has allowed for a large circular display that uses dot matrix technology. Under normal use, the sailing countdown is visible in legendary big OT digits. However, for the last 59 seconds the display comes alive to a massive 25mm. 
None of the world-famous features are lost, and buttons around the outside of the watch make them much easier to press with gloves on.

RACE OFIICERS PLEASE NOTE - The RED OS 1436 is capable of displaying sailing countdown and real time at the same time. 

The OS 1450R white, OS 1454R blue and OS 1455R yellow all come with a rechargeable battery and USB charger clamp. This extra power means we have been able to include a vibration buzzer to add to the louder alarm sound. Both vibration and sound can be switched off individually. 

SIZE
- Large 68mm overall ABS case
- Round 36mm diameter display size
- Large 13mm digits in normal mode
- Massive 23mm digits for final 59 seconds

FEATURES:
- 3 Row display to show time and timer together
- Adjustable viewing angle
- Boom/Mast mounting bracket supplied
- Will also attach to mast/boom via elastic
- Elasticated Strap for wearing on wrist or over sleeve
- Water Resistant to 5 ATM
- Shock Resistant Construction
- Buttons widely spaced for easy operation when wearing gloves
- Normal Timekeeping Mode (12 or 24 hour)

SPECIALIST SAILING TIMER FUNCTIONS:
- Countdown Repeat option or
- Countdown and Up to show elapsed time for handicap races
- 5,4,1,0 ISAF start sequence pre-programmed with audible warning signals (can be silenced if preferred)
- 5 minute and 3 minute pre-programmed options.
- User selectable 1 minute periods - ideal for match racing.
- Sync Button - The famous Optimum Time invention to quickly get back to Race time if the gun is missed.
- Count-up from zero if required to time a match.

SPECIAL FEATURES ON WHITE/BLUE/YELLOW TIMERS:
- Rechargeable battery giving extra power and very long life
- Bespoke USB charger clamp included for convenient charging.
- Vibration alarm to coincide with beep sound. For when it's either too noisy to hear the beeps, or you don't want them heard by others. The vibration and the sound are both individually switchable.

Red - OS1436 - (note: red not rechargeable)
White - OS1450R
Blue - OS1454R
Yellow - OS1455R

description:

name: Little Hawk Mk1 Wind Indicator
description:
EX1242
Low friction racing wind indicator
5 mm shaft, which fits all common top pins (top pins not included).

The Little Hawk MK1 is a small lightweight and robust Wind Indicator designed to be positioned at the top of the mast on dinghies up to 6m. Very popular with Optimists, the Little Hawk MK1 is also ideal for any dinghy that wants accurate wind direction information with minimal weight and drag.

The Vane Arm is made of super tough nylon and is all but indestructible. The aluminium rod can be easily straightened if damaged or easily bent to any required angle. The whole unit is easily assembled straight from the box.
Only 16 grams. Made in England

name: Little Hawk Mk2 Wind Indicator
description:
EX2020
Attaches to your mast. Useful both upwind, especially in the light stuff when your tell tails won't lift or are stuck to the sail, or downwind to get reverse flow. 

The Little Hawk Mk2 brings all the benefits of the Little Hawk Mk1 Wind Indicator and mounts it securely at gooseneck height in front of the mast. Designed for smaller single handed Dinghies, the Little Hawk Mk2 allows quick and accurate reference to wind direction without having to look at the top of the mast. Ideal for upwind and downwind reference. The Little Hawk Mk2 is easily mounted and removed with a secure adjustable bracket. The aluminium support rod can be bent to any required angle, but is easily straightened if accidentally knocked. The complete unit removes for safe storage without any tools.
Made in England.

name: Optimist Mast Top Pins/Wind Indicator Holder
description:
Sold as a pair.
Black plastic pins to hold wind vane and sail to top of racing mast.

name: Skywatch Xplorer 1
description:
Instant wind speed measurement with 'max' speed reached displayed

    Features:-
    Wind speed units: km/h, m/s
    Maximum reading: 150 km/h, 42 m/s, 81 knots, 97 mph, 138 fps
    Backlight
    Stainless steel back
    Replaceable lithium battery
    Operation temperature: -20°C to 70°C (-4°F to 158°F)
    Accuracy according to Swiss Standards
    Auto-off after 1 minute
    Weatherproof (not waterproof)

name: Skywatch Meteos
description:
A Clever First Step into Meteorology !

Wind speed and temperature meter, including a calculation mode of the wind-chill factor (temperature felt when the wind is blowing). Used by fire fighters, farmers, scientists, etc.

SKYWATCH® Meteos is a thermo-anemometer who measure wind strength without worrying about his position. The Skywatch meteos 1 is energized by a replaceable AA battery. The display is made up 99.9 at the 10th, then to the unit. A thread on the botoom plate allows its mount on a tripod photo.

Wind-Chill Factor : The Wind Chill Factor is a calculation of the wind effect on temperature. The faster the wind blows, the faster the body loses heat. It is dangerous if your body loses too much heat. For example : a 0°C current temperature and a 30 km/h wind bring you a temperature of -13°C !!! At sea, in the mountain, while you are trekking or biking, the SKYWATCH Meteos will give you instantly the real temperature felt by your body and preserve you from frostbite and hypothermia.

Waterproof, protection cap for impeller and aluminium base.

   - Instant windspeed units km/h, m/s, knots, mph, fps, and Beaufort
   - Backlight
   - Temperature measuring Minimum, average and maximum
   - Wind chill factor calculation
   - Weight 235g
   - Size 65 x 155mm
   - Average windspeed (3s - 24h)
   - Maximum windspeed
   - Aluminium bottom plate for tripod attachment
   - 2 AA batteries
   - Waterproof - floating
   - Operating temperature from -20C to 70C
   - Measuring range 2 to 150 km/h
   - Windspeed accuracy +-3%
   - Swiss Official calibration
   - Protective cap for the impeller

name: Optimist Daggerboard Bungy Handle
description:
6 mm shockcord with pvc handle to retain the daggerboard in its case. The legal handle to keep your daggerboard in place. Keeps your hiking straps up too. Comes in a complete set with 2 sizes of tubing, shockcord and 3 mm Vectran rope to keep the shockcord in place. 

Made by The Sailing Shop using Liros quality shockcord and vectran.

Fully assembled, easy to install.

name: Optiparts Daggerboard Protection Kit
description:
EX1117

A complete kit for protecting your valuable daggerboard: 4 rubber inserts, adhesive, sandpaper and 4 self-adhesive glide strips (300 x 18 x 1,0 mm each). These strips can be stuck to the top and the bottom of the case and minimize play and friction between the daggerboard and its case.

name: Optimist Sprit Block
description:
The Allen high tension stainless steel block range is specifically intended for use where wire, Dyneema and Spectra lines are loaded under high tension.  The entire block is engineered using 316 stainless steel and the inner ball race sheave is CNC machined from solid giving unfailing results every time.

Sheave Diameter:  16mm

Very low stretch, lightweight, with the ultimate in knot holding. Abrasion-resistant cover construction, with specially developed core of Dyneema SK78.

Optimised knot tenacity
Liros-Heat-Stretch-System

name: Liros Magic Optimist Mainsheet - 6 metres
description:
LIROS Magic Sheet has been specially developed for use as main and jib sheets on dinghies, sports boats and catamarans.

• Maximum flexibility: The cohesion between the core and the cover gives excellent flexibility and speed through the blocks.
• Handling: The precise nonslip grip give better control.
• Compact construction: With its round shape and compact braiding it assures excellent handling with good grip in cleats.

Construction:
Cover: Polyester Grip Fibre and Polyester spin-dyed, 16-plaited

LR01506-7-S

name: Liros Shock Cord 3mm
description:
Price per metre

Liros Shock Cord is manufactured in a round abrasion resistant construction.
The core is made from highly elastic rubber with excellent stretch characteristics.
The braided cover is made of abrasion resistant and highly resilient Polyester.
 
Use to tie daggerboard, bailers and paddle into the Optimist.

Cover: Polyester
Core: high quality latex rubber white.
Construction: 3mm 16-plaited
Colour: Red

LR00190-3

name: Liros Pro 2.5mm Dyneema
description:
Price per metre

The LIROS 100% pure Dyneema® rope with the latest technology in coating technology. The pre stretched 12-braid is extremely easy to splice. Impregnated with a special PU, the resistance to abrasion has improved more than 75%. The pre stretching process further improves the overall performance of the LIROS D Pro. These two treatments combined with the fact it is a pure Dyneema rope offer improved performance by as much as 70% over a conventional polyester covered Dyneema. 

A multi purpose rope with many applications across every sailing yacht. Ideal replacement for stainless steel wire.

• Stretch characteristics <1%
• best choice for all applications with extreme loads
• high UV light resistance
• easy to splice with an extra cover it can be used individually
• very high breaking strength at smallest diameter and lowest weight
• LIROS-Heat-Stretch-System

Available in:  Red, Blue, Yellow, Carbon Grey and White

Material:   Coated Dyneema® SK75 
Construction: 12-plaited, heat set and covered

2.5mm Breaking Strength 550kg

name: Optiparts Deck Collar with Mast Sleeve
description:
EX 1210

Deck collar with mast sleeve - grey.

name: Optiparts Deck Collar
description:
EX12101

Racing deckcollar - has an oval and tapered inner diameter. The oval inner diameter allows the maximum fore/aft play and minimum side play. The tapered inner diameter allows the mast to be raked. 4 countersunk mounting holes. Hole size in deck : Ø 57 mm.

Colour - grey

name: Optiparts Mast Sleeve
description:
EX1211

Mast sleeve only (as supplied with Blackgold masts). 
Fits around the mast at deck level and protects the mast from wearing. Goes with EX12101.

Colour - Grey

name: Optiparts Inboard End for 40mm Racing Boom
description:
EX1280

Optiparts boom end fittings are made of high quality glass fibre filled nylon. Unlike inboard boom-end fittings from other manufacturers ours have a firm grip around the mast.This ensures that mast and boom always turn together Diameters given are outside tube diameters.

name: Optiparts High Heel Plug
description:
EX 1256

High Heel plug, Low friction Delrin, for racing mast.

name: Optiparts Heel Plug for Silver or School Mast
description:
EX1257

Heavy Duty heel plug for silver or school masts

name: Optiparts Top Cap
description:
EX 1260

Top cap to seal the top of a silver mast.

name: Optiparts Adjuster Handle
description:
EX1354

Nylon sprit adjuster handle with hole for 4 mm rope. For easier handling of the halyard.

name: Optiparts Adjustable Mast Step - Round Type
description:
EX 1202

Round type maststep. This maststep has an oval cup, which allows the mast to tilt forward when going downwind. Different mast rakes can easily be repeated using the scale on the base.

name: Optiparts Padded Hiking Straps
description:
EX1450

Padded straps made of strong Nylon webbing partly covered with wear resistant cloth filled with foam plate material, which does not absorb water. Strong stitched through construction.

name: Optiparts Optimist Trolley
description:
EX 1076

Aluminum trolley with small or large pneumatic wheels. Now with stainless steel heel protector and BOW WOW !! A new unique system to lock the bow to the trolley with one quick and simple movement. The hull will not slide off the slippery wet trolley anymore. The BOW WOW prevents damage to the stern. Quick release push buttons: This system allows the trolley to be disassembled in three pieces in a few seconds. Large wheels are preferred where Optimists are being launched from beaches or muddy slipways. Made of square Aluminum tube with rounded corners. All joints are welded and all surfaces on which the boat rests are padded with red pvc tubing. Support: The axle of the trolley is extended so the hull fits upside down between the wheels. Anodized: The whole frame is anodized to prevent corrosion.

If delivery costs less than the $25 added for shipping at the checkout, we will refund you the difference.

name: Optiparts Bow Wow
description:
EX1077

Replacement Kit, includes foam handle covers. Secures boat to trolley in one easy move.

name: Optiparts Trolley Button Spring Locking System
description:
EX10792

Replacement Spring locking button for Optiparts Optimist Trolley.

name: Optiparts Galvanised Spring Clip
description:
EX10791

Galvanised spring clip for securing trolley wheels.

name: Optiparts Optiflex-Lite Puncture Proof Wheel
description:
EX10786

New large Optiflex-lite puncture proof wheels. The new Optiflex-lite wheels are the ultimate in wheel design. They are ultra light, weigh just 1750 grams, have a wide surface and large diameter for easy use on sand. Never have a flat tyre again.

If delivery costs less than the $25 added for shipping at the checkout, we will refund you the difference.

name: Optiparts Standard Tiller Extension
description:
EX1142

Standard Aluminum tiller extension with rubber joint and golf grip. 

Silver anodized
Length 60 cm
Weight 150 grams

name: Optiparts Deluxe Tiller Extension
description:
EX1140

Black anodized Aluminum, With a releasable rubber joint/swivel and long black EVA foam grip. The joint incorporates a fibre core molded up in the centre. This fibre core will avoid complete failure should the rubber tear. Length 60 cm. Weight 128 grams.

name: Optiparts Deluxe "Jamaica" Tiller Extension
description:
EX1141

Deluxe tiller extension, Black anodized Aluminum, With a releasable rubber joint/swivel and long multicoloured eva foam grip. The joint incorporates a fibre core molded up in the centre. This fibre core will avoid complete failure should the rubber tear. Length 60 cm. Weight 128 grams.

name: Optiparts Tiller Silver Anodised Aluminium
description:
EX1120

2 rectangular Aluminum tubes mounted together. Plastic end caps Size of tubes 10 X 20 X 1.5 mm 
Suitable for all sizes of Optimist rudderblades. With bolts, nuts and washers to mount on rudderblade. 
Weight 265 grams.

name: Optiparts Tiller Black Anodised Aluminium
description:
EX1122

Aluminum tiller. 2 rectangular Aluminum tubes mounted together. Plastic end caps Size of tubes 10 X 20 X 1.5 mm 
Suitable for all sizes of Optimist rudderblades. 
With bolts, nuts and washers to mount on rudderblade. 
Weight 265 grams.

name: Optiparts Rudderblade & Daggerboard (GRP School Blades)
description:
EX11150

GRP SCHOOL FOILS - GRP school foils. Less expensive than epoxy racing foils but Allows skipper to skull while preventing the boat from stalling. Intended for training and school use only. 
With rudder fittings mounted.

name: Optiparts Epoxy One Design Racing Foils
description:
EX11155

Built according to the new class rules. Class rules have standardized daggerboard and rudder: size, shape, epoxy, foam and fiberglass. No longer do you have to pay high prices for World Class performance. 

Both rudder and daggerboard are made to the maximum allowed thickness to create a foil as stiff as possible under the given rules. The daggerboards are fitted with nicely finished teak wood battens. 

With rudder fittings mounted.

name: Optiparts Rudder Fittings - complete set
description:
EX1150

The only perfect rudder fittings for the Optimist. Used on all top racing Optimists. Pin diameter 6 mm. (According to I.O.D.A. class rules) These stainless steel rudder fittings are available as a set or separate. 

Set includes:-
2 x rudder pintles 1 long & 1 short
2 Transom gudgeons with backing plates
1 rudder retaining clip, fits around blade. Can be fastened with 1 bolt which will not split the blade.

(12 bolts with self locking nuts sold separately - $4 per set).

For blades up to 15 mm thick.

name: Optiparts Bolts & Self Locking Nuts
description:
EX1155

Set of 12 Bolts and self locking nuts to go with the Optiparts Rudder Fittings set.
6 for mounting the gudgeons and 6 for mounting the clips and the pintles.

name: Optiparts Foil Bag
description:
EX1119

Constructed of 600 D Nylon, this blade bag is made to last. 
With 3 compartments for rudder, dagger and accessories. The rudder and daggerboard compartments are padded inside and out, protecting your blades from the outside world, and from each other. These compartments can be closed with a heavy duty zipper. 
It's unique shape also provides protection for the tiller and extension. Now this bag also comes with a detachable and adjustable strap. Decal with space for sail number and name.

name: Optiparts Rig Bag
description:
EX1063

Optimist rig travel bag. Heavy duty bag from 600 polyester with two compartments. One for the sail and boom, and one for the mast and sprit. With zip closure, name tag pocket and detachable and adjustable carrying strap. With 2 straps for bundling to create a compact package.

name: Racing Flags Sticker
description:
International Code Flag Sticker

Featuring Start Signals and Sequence along with many other flags often used by Start Boats and Officials as a way of communicating with those on the race course.

Sticker Dimensions:  13cm High 11.5cm Wide

name: Port and Starboard Stickers
description:
With a small and large option these stickers are perfect for those learning the rules and who in the heat of the moment need a reminder.

Size of the stickers are:

Small:  45mm wide, 22mm high
Large: 101mm wide, 35mm high

Choose between the sizes or have one size at the front of the boat and the other up the back.
